name: Five Nights at The Squad
description:
Welcome to Seudflyer’s Burgers and Fries! Your duty here is simply to watch over the place at night. That’s it! That’s the gist of the job, there’s no danger here, why would there be? This fan-game of the indie franchise Five Nights at Freddy’s has absolutely no danger to your health by any means! Of course, Seudflyer’s Burgers and Fries is not responsible for any damage to your person that may occur within our restaurant, however, the chance of that happening is little to none! Come in, enjoy a burger, and… Stay away from the animatronics. Keep them out of your office at all costs.

-Original game(s) by Scott Cawthon
